quote: I think houses live their own lives along a time-stream that's different from the ones upon which their owners float, one that's slower. In a house, especially an old one, the past is closer.
quote_letters: I THINK HOUSES LIVE THEIR OWN LIVES ALONG A TIME-STREAM THATS DIFFERENT FROM THE ONES UPON WHICH THEIR OWNERS FLOAT ONE THATS SLOWER IN A HOUSE ESPECIALLY AN OLD ONE THE PAST IS CLOSER
